content:
The reassoc here is interesting. I can't get it to work in mathlib4:

-- attribute [reassoc] map‚ÇÇ_associator
/-
The source declaration has attribute simp.
This attribute is not translated to the declarations generated by reassoc. Use something like
`@[reassoc (attr := simp)]` instead.
-/
-- attribute [reassoc (attr := simp)] map‚ÇÇ_associator
/-
errors with

CategoryTheory.OplaxFunctor.map‚ÇÇ_associator and CategoryTheory.OplaxFunctor.map‚ÇÇ_associator_assoc
do not generate the same number of simp lemmas.
-/

Still can't get it to work. Here's an example on master:

import Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Bicategory.Basic

namespace CategoryTheory

open Category Bicategory

open Bicategory

universe w‚ÇÅ w‚ÇÇ v‚ÇÅ v‚ÇÇ u‚ÇÅ u‚ÇÇ

structure PrelaxFunctor (B : Type u‚ÇÅ) [Quiver.{v‚ÇÅ + 1} B] [‚àÄ a b : B, Quiver.{w‚ÇÅ + 1} (a ‚ü∂ b)]
  (C : Type u‚ÇÇ) [Quiver.{v‚ÇÇ + 1} C] [‚àÄ a b : C, Quiver.{w‚ÇÇ + 1} (a ‚ü∂ b)] extends
  Prefunctor B C where
  map‚ÇÇ {a b : B} {f g : a ‚ü∂ b} : (f ‚ü∂ g) ‚Üí (map f ‚ü∂ map g)

section

variable {B : Type u‚ÇÅ} [Bicategory.{w‚ÇÅ, v‚ÇÅ} B] {C : Type u‚ÇÇ} [Bicategory.{w‚ÇÇ, v‚ÇÇ} C]

@[simp]
def OplaxFunctor.Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux (obj : B ‚Üí C) (map : ‚àÄ {X Y : B}, (X ‚ü∂ Y) ‚Üí (obj X ‚ü∂ obj Y))
    (map‚ÇÇ : ‚àÄ {a b : B} {f g : a ‚ü∂ b}, (f ‚ü∂ g) ‚Üí (map f ‚ü∂ map g))
    (map_comp : ‚àÄ {a b c : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c), map (f ‚â´ g) ‚ü∂ map f ‚â´ map g) {a b c d : B}
    (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) (h : c ‚ü∂ d) : Prop :=
  map‚ÇÇ (Œ±_ f g h).hom ‚â´ map_comp f (g ‚â´ h) ‚â´ map f ‚óÅ map_comp g h =
    map_comp (f ‚â´ g) h ‚â´ map_comp f g ‚ñ∑ map h ‚â´ (Œ±_ (map f) (map g) (map h)).hom
#align category_theory.oplax_functor.map‚ÇÇ_associator_aux CategoryTheory.OplaxFunctor.Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux

structure OplaxFunctor (B : Type u‚ÇÅ) [Bicategory.{w‚ÇÅ, v‚ÇÅ} B] (C : Type u‚ÇÇ)
  [Bicategory.{w‚ÇÇ, v‚ÇÇ} C] extends PrelaxFunctor B C where
  mapId (a : B) : map (ùüô a) ‚ü∂ ùüô (obj a)
  mapComp {a b c : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) : map (f ‚â´ g) ‚ü∂ map f ‚â´ map g
  mapComp_naturality_left :
    ‚àÄ {a b c : B} {f f' : a ‚ü∂ b} (Œ∑ : f ‚ü∂ f') (g : b ‚ü∂ c),
      map‚ÇÇ (Œ∑ ‚ñ∑ g) ‚â´ mapComp f' g = mapComp f g ‚â´ map‚ÇÇ Œ∑ ‚ñ∑ map g := by
    aesop
  mapComp_naturality_right :
    ‚àÄ {a b c : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) {g g' : b ‚ü∂ c} (Œ∑ : g ‚ü∂ g'),
      map‚ÇÇ (f ‚óÅ Œ∑) ‚â´ mapComp f g' = mapComp f g ‚â´ map f ‚óÅ map‚ÇÇ Œ∑ := by
    aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_id : ‚àÄ {a b : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b), map‚ÇÇ (ùüô f) = ùüô (map f) := by aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_comp :
    ‚àÄ {a b : B} {f g h : a ‚ü∂ b} (Œ∑ : f ‚ü∂ g) (Œ∏ : g ‚ü∂ h), map‚ÇÇ (Œ∑ ‚â´ Œ∏) = map‚ÇÇ Œ∑ ‚â´ map‚ÇÇ Œ∏ := by
    aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_associator :
    ‚àÄ {a b c d : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) (h : c ‚ü∂ d),
      OplaxFunctor.Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux obj map map‚ÇÇ map_comp f g h := by
    aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_leftUnitor :
    ‚àÄ {a b : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b),
      map‚ÇÇ (Œª_ f).hom = mapComp (ùüô a) f ‚â´ mapId a ‚ñ∑ map f ‚â´ (Œª_ (map f)).hom := by
    aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_rightUnitor :
    ‚àÄ {a b : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b),
      map‚ÇÇ (œÅ_ f).hom = mapComp f (ùüô b) ‚â´ map f ‚óÅ mapId b ‚â´ (œÅ_ (map f)).hom := by
    aesop


namespace OplaxFunctor

attribute [reassoc] map‚ÇÇ_associator
/-
application type mismatch
  @eq_whisker' ?C ?inst‚úù ?X ?Y ?f ?g
    (@id
      (‚àÄ {B : Type u‚ÇÅ} [inst : Bicategory B] {C : Type u‚ÇÇ} [inst_1 : Bicategory C] (self : OplaxFunctor B C)
        {map_comp :
          {a b c : B} ‚Üí
            (f : a ‚ü∂ b) ‚Üí
              (g : b ‚ü∂ c) ‚Üí
                (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor) (f ‚â´ g) ‚ü∂
                  (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor) f ‚â´
                    (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor) g},
        autoParam
          (‚àÄ {a b c d : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) (h : c ‚ü∂ d),
            Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor.obj
              (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor)
              (fun {a b} {f g} => PrelaxFunctor.map‚ÇÇ self.toPrelaxFunctor) map_comp f g h)
          _auto‚úù)
      (fun B [Bicategory B] C [Bicategory C] self => self.8) B inst‚úù¬π C inst‚úù self map_comp)
argument
  @id
    (‚àÄ {B : Type u‚ÇÅ} [inst : Bicategory B] {C : Type u‚ÇÇ} [inst_1 : Bicategory C] (self : OplaxFunctor B C)
      {map_comp :
        {a b c : B} ‚Üí
          (f : a ‚ü∂ b) ‚Üí
            (g : b ‚ü∂ c) ‚Üí
              (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor) (f ‚â´ g) ‚ü∂
                (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor) f ‚â´
                  (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor) g},
      autoParam
        (‚àÄ {a b c d : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) (h : c ‚ü∂ d),
          Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor.obj
            (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor)
            (fun {a b} {f g} => PrelaxFunctor.map‚ÇÇ self.toPrelaxFunctor) map_comp f g h)
        _auto‚úù)
    (fun B [Bicategory B] C [Bicategory C] self => self.8) B inst‚úù¬π C inst‚úù self map_comp
has type
  autoParam
    (‚àÄ {a b c d : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) (h : c ‚ü∂ d),
      Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor.obj
        (fun {X Y} => Prefunctor.map self.toPrelaxFunctor.toPrefunctor)
        (fun {a b} {f g} => PrelaxFunctor.map‚ÇÇ self.toPrelaxFunctor) map_comp f g h)
    _auto‚úù : Prop
but is expected to have type
  ?f = ?g : Prop
-/
Does it help if you make map2AssociatorAux reudicble?
I think/hope this aux def is no longer needed

Oh it was just a typo:

import Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Bicategory.Basic

namespace CategoryTheory

open Category Bicategory

open Bicategory

universe w‚ÇÅ w‚ÇÇ v‚ÇÅ v‚ÇÇ u‚ÇÅ u‚ÇÇ

structure PrelaxFunctor (B : Type u‚ÇÅ) [Quiver.{v‚ÇÅ + 1} B] [‚àÄ a b : B, Quiver.{w‚ÇÅ + 1} (a ‚ü∂ b)]
  (C : Type u‚ÇÇ) [Quiver.{v‚ÇÇ + 1} C] [‚àÄ a b : C, Quiver.{w‚ÇÇ + 1} (a ‚ü∂ b)] extends
  Prefunctor B C where
  map‚ÇÇ {a b : B} {f g : a ‚ü∂ b} : (f ‚ü∂ g) ‚Üí (map f ‚ü∂ map g)

section

variable {B : Type u‚ÇÅ} [Bicategory.{w‚ÇÅ, v‚ÇÅ} B] {C : Type u‚ÇÇ} [Bicategory.{w‚ÇÇ, v‚ÇÇ} C]

@[simp]
def OplaxFunctor.Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux (obj : B ‚Üí C) (map : ‚àÄ {X Y : B}, (X ‚ü∂ Y) ‚Üí (obj X ‚ü∂ obj Y))
    (map‚ÇÇ : ‚àÄ {a b : B} {f g : a ‚ü∂ b}, (f ‚ü∂ g) ‚Üí (map f ‚ü∂ map g))
    (map_comp : ‚àÄ {a b c : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c), map (f ‚â´ g) ‚ü∂ map f ‚â´ map g) {a b c d : B}
    (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) (h : c ‚ü∂ d) : Prop :=
  map‚ÇÇ (Œ±_ f g h).hom ‚â´ map_comp f (g ‚â´ h) ‚â´ map f ‚óÅ map_comp g h =
    map_comp (f ‚â´ g) h ‚â´ map_comp f g ‚ñ∑ map h ‚â´ (Œ±_ (map f) (map g) (map h)).hom
#align category_theory.oplax_functor.map‚ÇÇ_associator_aux CategoryTheory.OplaxFunctor.Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux

structure OplaxFunctor (B : Type u‚ÇÅ) [Bicategory.{w‚ÇÅ, v‚ÇÅ} B] (C : Type u‚ÇÇ)
  [Bicategory.{w‚ÇÇ, v‚ÇÇ} C] extends PrelaxFunctor B C where
  mapId (a : B) : map (ùüô a) ‚ü∂ ùüô (obj a)
  mapComp {a b c : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) : map (f ‚â´ g) ‚ü∂ map f ‚â´ map g
  mapComp_naturality_left :
    ‚àÄ {a b c : B} {f f' : a ‚ü∂ b} (Œ∑ : f ‚ü∂ f') (g : b ‚ü∂ c),
      map‚ÇÇ (Œ∑ ‚ñ∑ g) ‚â´ mapComp f' g = mapComp f g ‚â´ map‚ÇÇ Œ∑ ‚ñ∑ map g := by
    aesop
  mapComp_naturality_right :
    ‚àÄ {a b c : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) {g g' : b ‚ü∂ c} (Œ∑ : g ‚ü∂ g'),
      map‚ÇÇ (f ‚óÅ Œ∑) ‚â´ mapComp f g' = mapComp f g ‚â´ map f ‚óÅ map‚ÇÇ Œ∑ := by
    aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_id : ‚àÄ {a b : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b), map‚ÇÇ (ùüô f) = ùüô (map f) := by aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_comp :
    ‚àÄ {a b : B} {f g h : a ‚ü∂ b} (Œ∑ : f ‚ü∂ g) (Œ∏ : g ‚ü∂ h), map‚ÇÇ (Œ∑ ‚â´ Œ∏) = map‚ÇÇ Œ∑ ‚â´ map‚ÇÇ Œ∏ := by
    aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_associator :
    ‚àÄ {a b c d : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b) (g : b ‚ü∂ c) (h : c ‚ü∂ d),
      OplaxFunctor.Map‚ÇÇAssociatorAux obj map map‚ÇÇ mapComp f g h := by
    aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_leftUnitor :
    ‚àÄ {a b : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b),
      map‚ÇÇ (Œª_ f).hom = mapComp (ùüô a) f ‚â´ mapId a ‚ñ∑ map f ‚â´ (Œª_ (map f)).hom := by
    aesop
  map‚ÇÇ_rightUnitor :
    ‚àÄ {a b : B} (f : a ‚ü∂ b),
      map‚ÇÇ (œÅ_ f).hom = mapComp f (ùüô b) ‚â´ map f ‚óÅ mapId b ‚â´ (œÅ_ (map f)).hom := by
    aesop


namespace OplaxFunctor

attribute [reassoc] map‚ÇÇ_associator
